title: My First Post: Building This Portfolio
content: If you're reading this, you're inside the very thing I'm writing about! This portfolio was a fun challenge. I wanted to move away from the standard, modern, minimalist designs and do something with a bit more personality.
What's more nostalgic for a developer in my generation than Windows 98? (Okay, so this is the Win7 wallpaper, but the UI is 98!). The whole thing is built with:

• Plain HTML
  • Vanilla JavaScript
  • The amazing 98.css library

1. Kunal (Folder): This opens up to show my resume.pdf, complete with a fake loading bar.
  2. Internet (This Blog): You're here! A place for me to write thoughts.
  3. Recycle Bin: Currently just shows that it's empty.
Thanks for stopping by. Click around and don't hesitate to contact me (link not yet wired up!).
